altTitles.en: Phantom Thief Jeanne - Digital Colored Comics

altTitles.ja: 神風怪盗ジャンヌ カラー版

altTitles.en: Divine Wind Phantom Thief Jeanne (Official Colored)

description.en: High school student Maron Kusakabe has a secret: she’s Phantom Thief Jeanne. She sneaks into private art collections to steal paintings in which demons reside. Jeanne’s task is to seal the demons before they can devour human hearts. So far she’s been able to evade the police on her midnight outings, but now another thief has come onto the scene—Phantom Thief Sinbad—and he’s trying to take the paintings before she does!

biography.en:
Arina Tanemura was born on March 12, 1978. She debuted in 1996 with the short comic The Style of the Second Love.  
In addition to her publications, Tanemura has released two independent studio albums of songs based on her characters and is the character designer for Idolish7 and Alice Closet.
She gained popularity in late 1990s to early 2000s. Two of her series published at that time, Kamikaze Kaitou Jeanne and Full Moon wo Sagashite, received anime adaptations.
Doujin circles: Meguro Teikoku, Strawberry Lunch, Meguro Empire.
